content.rendered:
Directed by Vijay Ratnakar Gutte.

Written by Sanjaya Baru. Karl Dunne. Vijay Ratnakar Gutte. Jody Medland. Aditya Sinha. Mayank Tewari.

Cast Anupam Kher(Manmohan Singh). Akshaye Khanna(Sanjay Baru). Suzanne Bernert(Sonia Gandhi). Vipin Sharma(Ahmed Patel). Arjun Mathur(Rahul Gandhi). Aahana Kumra(Priyanka Gandhi). Divya Seth Shah(Mrs. Gursharan Kaur (as Divya Seth)). Anish Kuruvilla(T.K.A. Nair). Prakash Belawadi(M.K. Narayanan). Madan Joshi(Brijesh Mishra). Pradip Chakravarti(Pranab Mukherjee). Shiv Subramaniam(P. Chidambaram). Yogesh Tripathy(Natwar Singh). Bobby Parvez(Pulok Chatterjee). Anil Zankar(Sitaram Yechury). Deepak Gheewala(N. Ram (as Deepak Ghewala)). Anil Rastogi(Shivraj Patil). Naval Shukla(Yashwant Sinha). Atul Kumar(Mani Dixit). Ramesh Bhatkar(Prithviraj Chavan). Hansal Mehta(Naveen Patnaik) . Mizzy Ali(Prime Minster’s Bodyguard). Abdul Quadir Amin(Ajay Singh). Manoj Anand(Prime Minster’s Bodyguard). Sandeep Dhabale(Arnab Goswami (as Sandeep Shridhar)). Mike Gassaway(President George W. Bush). Joginder Singh Jagpal(Prime Minster’s Official).Shraddha Joshi. Jess Kaur(Prime Minster’s Official). Parrgash Kaur(Prime Minster’s Official). Mohammed Amar Khan(Prime Minster’s Bodyguard). Shaukat Khan(Prime Minster’s Official). Bharat Mistri(Indian Councillor). Naj Modak(The Primeminister’s Bodyguard). Amaan Sadiq(Bodyguard). Hamid Sahar(Prime Minster’s Bodyguard). Ajit Satbhai(P.V.Narshimha Rao). Arsh Parminder Shah(Minister). Atul Sharma(Press Reporter). Chitragupta Sinha(P.V.Ranga Rao). Ramesh Vethanayagam(Minister)

Languages Hindi. English.

Producers Bloom Arts. Ravi Bohra. Sunil Bohra. Nikesh Chauhan. Jim Edgar. Dhaval Gada. Jatin Pawan Girotra. Aakash Jain. Chee Teng Joo. Arshad Ashfaque Khan. Amogh Malavia. Dhanashree Mehta. Hansal Mehta. Pinkesh Nahar. Sanjeev Singh Pal. Ashoke Pandit. Cyrus Patel.

Production Bohra Bros Productions. Rudra Production.
